news_header: Putin and Trump may meet in February; relations between US and Russia need revival.
news_original_title: Peskov: Putin ja Trump saattavat tavata helmikuussa
news_text: Russian President Vladimir Putin and US President Donald Trump may meet before the end of February. Dmitri Peskov stated that preparation takes time. Trump indicated a possible meeting in February. Peskov mentioned that the recent meeting of US and Russian Foreign Ministers in Saudi Arabia was crucial for resolving the Ukraine crisis, focusing on bilateral relations. He emphasized the need to revive US-Russia relations for restoration.
